instanceVariables.name: curZone
instanceVariables.desc: The zone the character is currently in

instanceVariables.name: scrollYmin
instanceVariables.desc: The minimum value ScrollY is allowed to have  in the current zone

instanceVariables.name: ScrollYmax
instanceVariables.desc: The maximum value ScrollY is allowed to have in the current zone

instanceVariables.name: eToBeat
instanceVariables.desc: Number of enemies to beat to clear up the current zone and keep on scrolling

instanceVariables.name: dir
instanceVariables.desc: Orientation of the character, used for the hitbox

instanceVariables.name: reachY
instanceVariables.desc: The vertical reach for the character
